resources.string: The app will now try to save files.
The app will NOT try to save files.
Please select a folder for saving files.
(The path might not be displayed in a recognizable form. Tap on it if you wish to change it.)

1. After setting up the path and enabling file-saving, one may start to open files (from another app) with this application. When this app is picked for opening a file, it will store the file into the specified folder and exit.
2. It might take time (or a reboot, or two) for this to be fully functional (That is, to be able to work with all your apps, or most of the apps.) after installed for the first time.
The source code of this app is available at
